name: mix-town
description: A variety of simple components that match an aria-role

scripts.deploy:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
